column1: Smoque BBQ////I've only waited in line once
column2: and it was long but worth it. Take out is even better though! Order ahead of time
column4: just Smoque deliciousness in the comfort of your own home. I like everything I've tried here
column5: but that brisket and baked beans are worth noting
column6: because I hated both of those things before I tried them at Smoque. The baked beans are unreal-great spices and nice
column8: but what really puts them over the edge is that they are smoked like the rest of the food. I had never experienced that before Smoque!
